nation.name: United States
nation.government_note: Use the real current US government structure. Real parties (Democrat, Republican), real branches, real agencies. Fictional characters should hold lower-level or local positions only â€” never replace real sitting federal officials.

ongoing_stories.headline: Dunmore Port Workers Strike Enters Week 3
ongoing_stories.summary: Longshoremen at Dunmore Port, New Hampshire have been striking over pension cuts since March 4th. Talks collapsed twice. Federal mediators from the NLRB have been called in. Governor Ellen Marsh faces mounting pressure to intervene.

ongoing_stories.headline: Toledo Water Contamination Investigation Widens
ongoing_stories.summary: State regulators confirmed elevated lead levels in Toledo, Ohio municipal water supply near the Maumee River corridor. EPA regional office has opened a formal inquiry. City officials dispute the severity of the findings.

ongoing_stories.headline: Flathead County Braces for Early Wildfire Season
ongoing_stories.summary: Unusually dry conditions in Montana have prompted Flathead County to declare a preemptive state of emergency. Three small brush fires already contained this month near Kalispell.

ongoing_stories.headline: Budget Standoff: Senate Committee Deadlocked on Infrastructure Bill
ongoing_stories.summary: The Senate Appropriations Committee has been unable to reach agreement on the $1.2 trillion infrastructure modernization package. A bipartisan coalition remains at an impasse over rural broadband funding allocation.

ongoing_stories.headline: Port Calloway Residents Demand Answers After Chemical Plant Audit
ongoing_stories.summary: Residents of Port Calloway, Louisiana are demanding a public hearing after a state environmental audit flagged three violations at the Gulfmark Petrochemical facility. Company denies any public health risk.

anchors.name: Patricia Holt
anchors.description: Senior anchor, calm authority, 20 years experience. Known for measured delivery and pointed follow-up questions. Joined TNN in 2006.
anchors.sign_off: For This News Now, I'm Patricia Holt.

anchors.name: Marcus Webb
anchors.description: Evening anchor, slightly more urgent delivery. Former field correspondent, transitioned to desk in 2019. Known for breaking news coverage.
anchors.sign_off: Reporting for This News Now, Marcus Webb.

anchors.name: Elena Torres
anchors.description: Field reporter, warm but direct. Covers breaking stories on location. Joined TNN in 2021 after five years at a regional affiliate.

anchors.name: James Whitfield
anchors.description: Weekend anchor and fill-in field reporter. Slightly conversational tone, good at long-form segments. Joined TNN in 2020.

real_entities_allowed: US federal government (President, VP, Congress, agencies like EPA, FEMA, NLRB, FBI)
must_be_fictional: All named individuals below federal level (governors, mayors, police chiefs, etc.)
world_rules.mixing_rule: Stories should blend real places and real agencies with fictional people and fictional events. This creates the uncanny almost-real feeling. A story can be set in a real city with a real federal agency investigating, but the local officials, the specific incident, and all quotes must be invented.
